text: Merlin Russell "Boody" Gilbertson (July 3, 1922 – May 23, 2015) was an American professional basketball player who played in the National Basketball League for the Sheboygan Red Skins.Former Everett High and UW basketball player Merlin ‘Boody’ Gilbertson dies at age 92 ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Basketball players from Washington (state) Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Everett, Washington Category:Sheboygan Red Skins players Category:Washington Huskies men's basketball players
title: Boody Gilbertson
